Subject: DB meets Diamond/Hot Rod & Feline
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He transformed back to bot mode, and made his way through the brush.
It was hard, but he finally found the tree Feline was in. He climbed it,
careful not to break it under his weight. He found himself next to her.
"Please transform, so we can talk face to face." 
He really didn't want to have an important conversation to a beast mode.

::DrillBit::

He saw Diamond.
"Hello. Yes, I'm a Predicon. The name is DrillBit. We recieved your
message, and I was sent to escort you to base."
